subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: James Blake lost to Tomas Berdych, 6-1, 2-6, 7-5, 7-5, leaving the United States tied at 1-1 with the Czech Republic. Earlier, Andy Roddick defeated the Davis Cup rookie Ivo Minar.
snippet: James Blake lost to Tomas Berdych, 6-1, 2-6, 7-5, 7-5, leaving the United States tied at 1-1 with the Czech Republic. Earlier, Andy Roddick defeated the Davis Cup rookie Ivo Minar.
